declarations.description:
A File Input element From Simplr Components

Usage

<simplr-file-input name="files" multi label="Drag and Drop your files here"></simplr-file-input>
declarations.name: SimplrFileInput

cssParts.description: Secondary color of input element. Used for error states
cssParts.name: --secondary-color

cssParts.description: Color of the chosen file list item background
cssParts.name: --list-item-background

members.name: label
members.description: Label of input element

members.name: name
members.description: Name of input element

members.name: disabled
members.description: Boolean stating if input is disabled

members.name: required
members.description: Boolean stating if input is required

members.name: multi
members.description: Boolean stating if input allows multiple files to be chosen

parameters.name: indexOrName
parameters.description: Index or name of the file to be removed

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: Boolean set true when input has a invalid value

attributes.name: filehover
attributes.description: Boolean set true when a file is hovered on top of the field

declarations.description:
A Input element From Simplr Components

Usage

<simplr-input label="Testing input one" name="input-one" placeholder="Input the desired value"> </simplr-input>
declarations.name: SimplrInput

cssParts.description: Secondary color of input element. Used for error states
cssParts.name: --secondary-color

cssParts.description: Size of the underline of the input elements
cssParts.name: --underline-size

cssParts.description: Color of the highlights used by the input
cssParts.name: --highlight-color

cssParts.description: Font size of the input element
cssParts.name: --font-size

cssParts.description: Transition of the input element focus transitions
cssParts.name: --transition

members.name: label
members.description: Label of input element

members.name: type
members.description: Type of input element

members.name: name
members.description: Name of input element

members.name: placeholder
members.description: Placeholder of input element

members.name: disabled
members.description: Boolean stating if input is disabled

members.name: required
members.description: Boolean stating if input is required

members.name: step
members.description: Step attribute for number inputs

attributes.name: invalid
attributes.description: Boolean set true when input has a invalid value
Boolean set true when input has content in it
attributes.name: hascontent

declarations.description:
A Loading element From Simplr Components

Usage

<simplr-loading></simplr-loading>

To remove loading, call hide()

members.name: timeout
members.description: Timeout of the Notification. Defaults to 4000, Set to 0 to disable timeout.

members.description: Title of the Notification

members.name: message
members.description: Message of the Notification

members.name: role
members.description: Role of the Notification. Determines the color and icon.

members.description: Spawn a new Simplr Notification

members.description:
Create the TemplateResult for the left side actions, and
save them since we don't want to re-create them
